message-one: Combining the stabality of the Yuwan with the efficiency of Blockchain Technology. CNT is designed to be secure, liquid and convenient
message-five: CNT is a TRC-20 token issued and redeemed on a 1:1 basis against the Yuwan. It is designed to be easily redeemable and provides a tool for holders to reduce volatility when participating in the Cryptocurrency market.

message-nine: CNT is a token built on the Ethereum, Tron networks and Cube. with high degrees of decentralization and security.
message-twle: CNT, like many other stablecoins, was designed for price stability compared to Bitcoin
message-thirteen: CNT As a Way To Pay For Goods And Services.
